title: Have I screwed myself with Ranked for life?
body: When I did my provisionals a couple of months ago I did not know how important they were and I kinda didn't play them seriously and even first timed some champs in them. Have I screwed myself with a really bad MMR? Because I'm not gonna sit here and tell you I belong in Challenger but like 80% of the time man.... My teammates..... Holy mother of God....

replies.body: Climbing on LoL is simple as playing thousands games and keeping like a 40% W/L ratio or being somewhat skilled at the game, from what I've experienced most players in Plat/Diam belong in low elo.

Can't be anymore wrong.

Although I don't have many friends I do know a few who are in plat/diamond who only have won around 50-100 games in ranked.

Rank system although can be grindy depending on what situation you're currently in, it's not made with grind in mind.

Hmmmmmmmm kden

Well out of all the SoloQ games I've played I can only remember 3 games. EVER. That legitimately felt like each player was Diam elo and deserved to be that rank, rest of my games are just a mix of silver level dumpsters with 1k+ games or boosted trash.

I understand what you mean. When I got my first ever account to level 30 back in 2010, I did my promos right away and lost 9 of them. Needless to say that account is still in bronze 5 to this day. But my other account that I just got to level 30 and did the promos is now gold 1. I still cant get my first account out of bronze 5 becuase of the players, and it is the players because I get teams that arent %%%%%%ed and know how to listen.

Don't make the mistake I did. The only champion I've played for an exceptional amount of time (during my LoL life) is Master Yi and that doesn't work in top ranked. I ended up playing Kayle for every lane and it worked okay. Recently, I've started randomly playing champions on free week for normals and I have started to learn basic mechanics for most champions.
no, you haven't. once season 5 starts, you'll be fine. i got placed in bronze 4 when i first started ranked.

Not necessarily, Your provisional games are based upon your MMR the season before. For example I was bronze 5 in season 3 and I was then placed in Bronze 3 in my Season 4 provisional's after winning 8/10 games.

Well, when I did my placements I got into Silver 2, and then lost thirty games in a row because I was clearly not meant to be anywhere near Silver. Placements generally have no merit on your skill, more or less the luck of the team mates you get put with during them.

At the start of the season, I was Bronze 2, now I'm Gold 5 (inb4 arguably the same which they are) 

If you lose a game, it's your fault. No one elses.  Solo queue requires diplomacy to calm the trolls, not just gameplay skills.
The trick to climbing is just playing lots. You don't even need to be good. If you can maintain a 50% winrate, you'll climb easy.

Still, blaming his team.

Clearly deserves Bronze. :/
Doesn't matter what rank you are, if you deserve to be higher, you will climb.

Stick to it mate, I thought I'd be Silver forever, but I climbed to Gold after I started forcing myself into basic habits and only playing champs I was exceptional with.
You'll get there, just be confident.
